name: string
content:
A sequence of characters. 

String is the word used to describe a sequence of characters that could be letters, numbers, or symbols. The string can be stored in a variable or printed onto the display when attached to specific text blocks.

examples.name: Example 1
examples.description: Printing text can make it look like the sprite is talking. Click the sprite to see it talk!

examples.name: Example 2
examples.description: Text can be used to describe data. Here, text is used to explain the bunnyâ€™s size.

palette_params.name: string
palette_params.description: Any sequence of characters inputted from the keyboard
